Connie Galiwango Nakayenze (amụrụ na 31 Ọgọst a afọ  1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na nwanyị na-anọchite anya Mbale District na Nzukọ nke iri na otu nke Uganda. Connie jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu na nke itoolu nke Uganda. Ọ nwere njikọ na pati na-achị achị, National Resistance Movement.
Ọ bụ nwanyị lụrụ di. Connie nọdụrụ maka ule Primary Leaving Examinations (PLE) na afọ 1981 na Gangama Primary School
O mechara nweta asambodo ndị nkuzi nke Grade III na afọ 1989 site na Kabwangasi Primary Teachers College na Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) na 1992 site na Mbale Hall
O nwekwara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị site na National Teachers College, Nagongera (1995)
N'afọ 2001, e nyere Connie nzere Bachelor of Arts na Social Sciences site na Mahadum Islamic dị na Uganda
Nke a sochiri Master of Arts na Education Management na afọ 2008 site n'otu Mahadum ahụ.
Ihe omume ntụrụndụ Connie bụ Volleyball, Music na Net Ball.
Connie bụ onye nkuzi na Nabuyonga Primary School n'etiti afọ 1989 na afọ 1993 tupu ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mbale S.S (1995), na Mbale High School (20032011)
N'agbata afọ 2011 na 2016, ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtakwara Connie maka ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda n'oge ntuli aka Jenụwarị, na afọ 2021 na Uganda.
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii na Education & Sports
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Kọmitii na HIV / AIDS & Related Disease na onye otu Kọمitii Azụmaahịa.
